entities.name: voldemort
entities.description: Voldemort is mentioned as a half-blood, indicating he has both magical and non-magical ancestry. This is described in the text by Hermione.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is mentioned as giving a little moan to Harry's reckless statement about Voldemort being a half-blood.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is mentioned as making a reckless statement about Voldemort being a half-blood, and also as having a spell deflected by Malfoy.

entities.name: malfoy
entities.description: Malfoy is mentioned as deflecting a spell from Bellatrix Lestrange's wand, causing it to hit the shelf near Harry.

entities.name: bellatrix lestrange
entities.description: Bellatrix Lestrange is mentioned as casting a spell that was deflected by Malfoy.

entities.name: voldemort's mother
entities.description: Voldemort's mother is mentioned as being a witch, indicating she had magical ancestry.

relationships.description: Malfoy deflected Bellatrix Lestrange's spell, causing it to hit the shelf near Harry.
Hermione mentioned Voldemort as a half-blood in response to Harry's reckless statement.
